name: Akko de Pon! Ikasama Hourouki
overview: Akko de Pon! Ikasama Hourouki is a mahjong game that brings the full stock of "Ikasama" skills, that is to say fraud and trickery has been fully implemented. Enjoy thrilling Ikasama mahjong that you can't taste in traditional mahjong games! It is also possible to play normal mahjong.
